title: new honer system
body: i have been playing lol since season 2 and had acumulated over 3000 honers combined.now im back at zero im very upsett.years of grinding to get those honers we the lol community should be compensated to be fair for the honers we already had,or at the very least given honers to match what we had.feeling ripped off again.

replies.body: ["FWIW we're planning a proper funeral for Honor 1.0 that will have some small goodies involved. You'll hear details once the new Honor is launched and stable (post-7.13)."](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/R7WAUcHa-honour-update?comment=0000)

also i have payed cash for 12 of my rune pages and a bunch of runes not to mention almost acumulateing all of them with shitloads of ip,why are you changeing the game format so much?why not concentrate on the things still missing from the original lol platform,and increase game maps for ranking even in aram and poro king instead of going away from the original set up for enjoying the game.honers wer hard to get then now honers negate them selves it seems to me.dont remove runes as they are please...there has to be a better way.
